description:
Kei, who joined the photography club, asks Komichi to model for some photos. They get started right away, but Kei says the photos don`t match the image she has of Komichi. That`s to be expected, considering all Komichi did was copy Fukumoto Miki`s poses. So as Komichi begins to wonder just what her "image" is, a certain occurrence results in her and Kei paying a visit to the Mangetsu Dorm, where Touko and many of their other classmates live. Komichi is deeply impressed by the sweets Touko makes, so with Touko`s guidance, she tries to make some of her own...
Source: crunchyroll
